name: Office 365 Outlook Web Access - Tighter interface
description:
* Tightens up the mail list so that you can fit around 40% more e-mails on one screen.
* Tightens up the folder list 20-25
* Changes fonts and more clearly marks unread messages, more like 2010 OWA
* Tries to address the white-on-white theme so you can actually see the different panes
additional_info:
Microsoft changes name of CSS tags depending on.. I don't know, language? Region? Server? I have two different clients where the same part of the page has a different name in CSS, if the style don't work for you at all it might be because of something like this. 

If you see something that doesn't scale right or is off/broken please let me know, I can't guarantee I will be able to fix it but I would still be grateful for your input.

discussions.name: New to this - How do i install this
